headline: Race for Ohio Senate seat: Jane Timken
author: Joe Toohey
sentences: CLEVELAND (WJW) — WDTN 2 News is your local election headquarters and we recently met with another candidate in the Republican Race for Senate.
Jane Timken is the former Ohio Republican Party Chair and is one of four of the GOP candidates vying for the seat of retiring Sen.
FOX 8’s Joe Toohey say down with Timken to discuss the state of the race, her Republican opponents and former President Trump.
We recently also sat down with candidate Mike Gibbons, Josh Mandel, JD Vance and Matt Dolan.
